name: Super Mario Unleashed
storyline: Super Mario Unleashed follows Mario in a race against time to save the world... himself!? When turned into a Midbus, an ancient Pig species, Mario must travel around The World, Restoring it From Bowser after he separated for his evil scheme, which is to build his country, Bowseria to gain diplomatic immunity so he can rule the world once. Along the way, Mario helps a new friend, Chippy, to remember who he is, together they'll travel around the world meeting old & new foes and allies.
summary: Super Mario Unleashed is a 2D Platforming game featuring normal levels in the daytime & reverse levels in the night, with combat.
